variant.name: CompiledModelLoad
variant.summary: time to load the compiled .mlmodelc file.

variant.name: MLModelCompile
variant.summary: time to compile the generated .mlmodel file.

variant.name: MLModelTranslate
variant.summary: time to translate from webnn graph to CoreML representation and serializes to disk.

variant.name: MLModelWrite
variant.summary: time to write the temporary .mlmodel file.

variant.name: MLWeightsWrite
variant.summary: time to write the temporary weights.bin file.

variant.name: ModelOutputRead
variant.summary: time it took to read back the inference results.

variant.name: ModelPredict
variant.summary: time predictionFromFeatures took when calling compute().

variant.name: ModelPredictWithDispatch
variant.summary: time predictionFromFeatures took when calling dispatch().

variant.name: Compilation
variant.summary: time to compile the DirectML graph.

variant.name: RecordGraphExecutionOnBackgroundThread
variant.summary: time to record graph execution on background thread.

variant.name: RecordGraphExecutionOnMainThread
variant.summary: time to record graph execution on the main thread.

histogram.name: WebNN.CoreML.TimingMs.{WebNNCoreMLActions}
histogram.summary: The time taken to perform a WebNN CoreML action. This includes {WebNNCoreMLActions}

histogram.name: WebNN.DeviceType
histogram.summary: Records what device type WebNN is running on.

histogram.name: WebNN.DML.TimingMs.{WebNNDMLActions}
histogram.summary: The time taken to perform a WebNN DML action. This includes {WebNNDMLActions}

histogram.name: WebNN.DMLCreateDevice.Error
histogram.summary: The HRESULT returned when an attempt to create a dml device fails.

histogram.name: WebNN.MLTensor.TimingMs.Read
histogram.summary: The time taken to read the ml tensor.

histogram.name: WebNN.Operator
histogram.summary: When an MLGraph is built using WebNN, this histogram records whether a given operator has been used. The enum value GraphBuilt is always logged once per MLGraph, so to see the prevalence of a given operator, you need to divide its count by GraphBuilt count.
